org.jscsi.initiator.taskbalancer
Interface ITaskBalancer

Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public interface ITaskBalancer

ILoadBalancer

This is an load balancer to distribute the workload to all opened connections within a session.

Author:
Volker Wildi

Method Summary
 Connection getConnection()
          Deprecated. Returns the next connection, which should used for the next task.
 void releaseConnection(Connection connection)
          Deprecated. Releases a used connection, so that it can be used by another task.
